title: Bug 37021 - Incorrect source path in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Incorrect source path in declare warning on binary files. The source path in the declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars is listed in the form "app.Main.class" instead of "app/Main". This issue can be reproduced by running the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/ directory. Please note that these tests may produce false positives as filename checking is not enabled in the harness verification of messages. Additionally, in some cases, the filenames may not appear at all.
OB: The source path in the declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars is listed in the form "app.Main.class" instead of "app/Main". I have also observed that in some cases, the filenames do not appear at all, but these tests do not reproduce that problem.
EB: The source path in the declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars should be listed in the form "app/Main" instead of "app.Main.class".
SR:
1. Navigate to the tests/new/binaryWarnings/ directory.
2. Run the code in the directory.
3. Observe the declare warning messages.
4. Verify that the source path in the declare warning messages for .class files from injars is listed as "app/Main", not "app.Main.class".
